description: Satya Nadella Build Keynote highlights analyzer – segments the keynote video at key narrative moments and extracts structured metadata for each clip, targeting 3.0 clips per minute and a total highlight duration of about 100 seconds.

config.segmentationDefinition: Segment the video around major topical turns, significant announcements, demos, guest speaker sessions, Q&A, and concluding remarks, ensuring an average of 3.0 clips per minute. The total length of all segments combined should be approximately 100 seconds of highlights.

StartTimeMs.description: Start time of this segment in milliseconds.

EndTimeMs.description: End time of this segment in milliseconds.

Description.description: Natural language description of what occurs in this segment (e.g., new product announcement, demo of technology).

SegmentType.description: Context or category of this segment within the keynote.

KeyTopic.description: Primary topic or technology highlighted in this segment.

PresenterName.description: Name of the speaker or presenter leading this segment (e.g., Satya Nadella, guest speaker).

SlideTitle.description: Title of the slide or main title displayed on-screen during this segment.

AnnouncementDetails.description: Specific details of the announcement or feature demonstration in this segment.

SpeakerExcitementLevel.description: Estimated excitement level displayed by the speaker(s).

AudienceEngagement.description: Estimated audience reaction or engagement level during this segment.
